name: Tumblr - Glee Blaine's Bow Tie cursor
description: Replace your cursor with a bow tie design! (Now with instructions for how to add this to your blog instead!)

user.name: GeekintheJeep
user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!

additional_info: Tested on Firefox only. Please let me know on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any possible alignment issues, questions, or requests! Or, if you'd rather add this to your blog instead of your dash, just place the code found here [x] inside the body (search /head in your CSS and scroll down to the body section) portion of your blog's CSS.
